definition: to intercede/to plead for sb else
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
feeling/emotion/passion/situation

sentences.english: He had occasionally tried to intercede for me.
sentences.chinese: 他有時候也極力爲我說情。

sentences.english: She was so unpopular that on one could be found to put in a word for her.
sentences.chinese: 她太不得人心了，沒有一個人肯替她說情。

sentences.english: A large number of compromising letters fell into the hands of investigators.
sentences.chinese: 大量的說情信件落入了調查人之手。

sentences.english: The lady said something to get the niggers off.
sentences.chinese: 那位夫人說情讓黑人們免於受罰。

sentences.english: He was quickly snubbed when he tried to intercede.
sentences.chinese: 當他試着說情時很快被制止了。

sentences.english: Vegetable Qi seek Yue mama to mention emotion, she certainly must also has homologous movement to just go.
sentences.chinese: 素琪去找嶽嬤嬤說情，她當然也得有相應的行動纔行。

sentences.english: The friend of God can plead with Him for others.
sentences.chinese: 神的朋友可以爲別人說情。

definition: to think for oneself and act accordingly (idiom); to act on one's own initiative
to dabble and stop (idiom); to dip into/to attempt half-heartedly/content with a smattering of knowledge
to make a long story short (idiom)
absolutely true (idiom)/manifold/true from many points of view
to look for trouble
to listen with respectful attention/(a polite request to sb to speak)/we are all ears
argumentative/quarrelsome
in a great mess/chaotic
to sound out the difficulties and retreat to avoid defeat (idiom); fig. to back out of an awkward situation/to get out on finding out what it's really like
to fail to grasp the main points
to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
affectionate/an affectionate person
money for a voyage/travel expenses
to twine/to coil
to take revenge and wipe out a grudge (idiom)
to bewail one's poverty/to complain about being hard up/to pretend to be poor
